segments.text: I notice the water running over the edge of the sink, creating a big puddle on the floor.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman seems completely oblivious to it, just drying her dishes.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I see the boy stretching to reach the cookie jar, standing on a wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl is waiting patiently for her cookie, her hand outstretched.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I think they're trying to be sneaky and not get caught.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The garden outside looks so nice and calm, it's a stark contrast to the mess inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it will take for the woman to notice the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks like it's about to tip over, and the boy could get hurt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I hope she turns around and sees what's happening soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scene is just a recipe for disaster.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe how calm everyone seems despite the chaos.
segments.speaker: PAR
